page.title: 02Our village of Eckington.
page.content: Our village is a Farming community. We are in a {market gardening}area.The main features of the village are The { {River Avon}where the people fish and Bredon Hill to walk up. Ithink villagers come to this village for the scenery also people come to enjoy {Bredon Hill}and the River Avon. There are also three country pubs in our village.If you walk up Bredon Hill and get to the top you get a magnificent view of the Avon valley and the{ {Malvern Hills}in the distance.You can see the{River Avon}bending and twisting through the villages.I like living here because there are lots of things to do.There is a shop that supplies just about everything ,a playing field with a climbing frame,swings and bars and a Scout hut where Scouts,Guides,Cubs and Brownies hold their meetings.
